employee_external_id.notes: Map to SAP SuccessFactors EmployeeTime externalCode field for cross-system employee identification

absence_type_external_id.notes: Map to SAP absence type external code for categorization and policy enforcement

status.notes: Map to SAP absence status field (Submitted, Approved, Rejected) for workflow state management

start_date.notes: Map to SAP start date field with YYYY-MM-DD format validation and timezone consideration

end_date.notes: Map to SAP end date field, ensuring end_date >= start_date for logical consistency

start_half_day.notes: Map to SAP half-day start indicator (AM/PM or boolean) for partial day absence tracking

end_half_day.notes: Map to SAP half-day end indicator, paired with end_date for precise duration calculation

amount.notes: Map to SAP numeric amount field for time quantity, must be paired with unit field

unit.notes: Map to SAP standardized unit field (HOURS/DAYS) providing context for amount field

employee_note.notes: Map to SAP employee note field for absence comments, ensure compliance with length limits

processing_context: SAP SuccessFactors Time Management API - Enhanced RAG analysis with semantic field mapping and business context
validation_notes: Validate external IDs against existing SAP records
Ensure end_date >= start_date for logical consistency
Pair amount field with unit field for proper context
Test with SAP sandbox environment before production
Reference SAP Help Portal for country-specific behaviors
